document_data.name: Haldreithen
document_data.mainbody: '''Haldreithen''' was a [[sun elf]] [[high mage]] lore keeper in [[Evermeet]].
document_data.History: In [[1374 DR]], after the failed [[fey'ri invasion of Evereska]], Haldreithen was among the high mages that summon [[Araevin Teshurr]] to explain about it.
